articles.author: Travis Northup
articles.title: Another Crab’s Treasure Review - IGN
articles.description: This soulslike throws out dark themes and gratuitous violence in favor of talking cartoon crabs.
articles.content: Its wonderfully ironic that the biggest breath of fresh air the soulslike genre has received in years comes from an adventure that takes place entirely underwater. Where most dodge-rolling action gam… [+6372 chars]
